akn:subsection.akn:heading: Disallowance of deductions in certain cases

akn:content.akn:p: (c) Disallowance of deductions in certain cases

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Special rule for irrevocable transfers of easements in real property

akn:content.akn:p: (d) Special rule for irrevocable transfers of easements in real property A deduction shall be allowed under subsection (a) in respect of any transfer of a qualified real property interest (as defined in section 170(h)(2)(C)) which meets the requirements of section 170(h) (without regard to paragraph (4)(A) thereof).
